attributes.action: go to Copenhagen for the final climate treaty summit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown should attend the summit in Copenhagen this year IN PERSON.  He must sign a fair, ambitious treaty which will commit this country to tackling climate change.  The Prime Minister attending in person will send a strong message to other world leaders.  There is useful further information on what the Copenhagen summit entails here: http://www.edspledge.com/why-we-need-a-deal

rejection.details: The PM has already signalled his intention to go to Copenhagen.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
